reviews.text:
Yesterday I celebrated my birthday (it was lunch for 2 hours). Everything went perfectly: delicious food, we were served by two (if I'm not mistaken) waiters. There were not many people in the restaurant at that time.
Pleasant and cozy interior.
What was especially pleasant and unexpected was the greeting from the restaurant: they greeted me in Georgian, bringing a horn with wine and khachapuri as a gift! Thank you very much to the waiters, cooks and administrator - everything was on top.
For me, as a birthday girl, they made a 15% discount. And they also allowed us to bring our own cake and alcohol (the only condition was that the order had to be at least UAH 500 per person, but it suited us)!
Thank you very much again!!! We liked it!

On February 14, they made an order through the delivery service, and prepared meals at the restaurant on Preobrazhenska Street, 26. The problems started because of an inadequate courier from this establishment. First he called and arrogantly offered to meet him on the street, after my surprise as to what the matter was, he replied with a laugh that the text in the comment was too much for him and he did not want to read it and hung up. The second time he called and asked why the door does not open, he confused the 2nd with the 8th entrance and hung up again, the third time he called already at my entrance and complained that the numbers were not the same and were not pressed and again hung up the phone. To be honest, after such impudence and excessive nervousness, I didn't want to take the order at all, but I am a decent person and somehow it became uncomfortable in front of the restaurant, in front of the cook who prepared these dishes. After such an unpleasant incident, I immediately called the restaurant's administration, they apologized that this was unacceptable behavior and that this was not their courier at all, they don't have enough couriers, this is a freelancer, they promised me that he would not work for them again. The next day, they called again from this establishment, they said that they will not fire him, another courier will work for my delivery and, as compensation, they will give me khinkali as a gift for the next order. Of course, this does not suit me, I will never order from this establishment again. That is, let this complete inadequacy be rude to your next customers!? With all his demonstrative behavior, he showed that he did not want to do this work, that it was not an occupation for him. Now, during the full-scale war in Kyiv, there are many displaced people who are looking for work, who really can and want to work responsibly, and you, the restaurant, are holding on to this junk? Well, good luck!
Now, as for the dishes themselves. The dishes you prepared do not look exactly like your photos on the website.
Rich beef broth Tatariahni:
not enough beef and greens, but you can eat.
Tsesaridze with chicken: you have a mix of salads written on your website, there was no mix! Only Beijing cabbage in large pieces. There was practically no parmesan, some crumb on the bottom of the package.
Nuts with condensed milk: they were kind of hard, no firmness in the structure of the dough.
With the first order, there was a gift: Chebureks with lamb. There was no cilantro, the lamb was too dry, no juiciness.
Well, the "icing on the cake" is Ojakhuri with pork, there were no greens, as in your photo, but the worst part is over-fried meat, it's burnt!!
It was impossible to eat like that.
The only advantage is the price, but it is better to pay more in another establishment and enjoy really tasty and healthy food.
Therefore, I do not recommend this restaurant.

Very cozy place, nice interior, dim light. The food is delicious, I liked the Adjarian-style khachapuri and assorted khinkali. I definitely recommend the restaurant, it was not crowded on Saturday afternoon

Visited the institution for the first time today. The service is bad, absolutely unfriendly. The cream soup with mushrooms and khinkali were tasty, the rice was fresh, and half of the khachapuri was burnt. To which we were told "it's normal". I wish you to establish a high-quality service so that you want to come back.

Haven't tried it yet, we're waiting for pickup, it's terrible. The operator said come in 40 minutes, we came and here we waited for an hour ü§Øü§Øü§Ø, I don't want to eat anything anymore. For punctual people, or those who do not like delays, it is simply an abyss. People who sit in hotels also wait a long time. I will add a review if you like the food.
(M. Darnytsia)
Addition:
It's terrible, khachapuri is cold!!!! The yolk is weathered!! It's a 2 hour wait.
I will not give 100% advice.
